snippet: The country has slipped into chaos since rebels seized the capital and ousted President François Bozizé in March.
abstract: United Nations officials say that Central African Republic is at risk of spiraling into genocide as armed groups incite Christians and Muslims against each other in virtually lawless country.
lead_paragraph: The country has slipped into chaos since rebels seized the capital and ousted President François Bozizé in March.

headline.main: Central African Republic: U.N. Is Warned About Genocide Threat
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: U.N. Is Warned About Genocide Threat

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
